attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: I open this app, expecting to see my beautiful president, my orange little fluff ball. But instead I got flooded with tanning ads and penis enlargement surgeries, I just want to see his campaign and how he’s going to deport these Mexican but instead The app crashes and opens candy crush. Plz help

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: For starters...DO NOT GET THIS APP! This app took 2 whole days to download onto my phone and then when I opened the app my phone crashed for about 3 weeks. I had to buy a new phone thanks to this app. And on top of this the app won’t stop texting me notifications!

attributes.title: Bad👎 Terrible 🤢 Disgusting 🤮
attributes.review: 🧚All I wanted to do was support my fearless leader: ✨Daddy Donny the Great Orange Hope✨. But I was so saddened to see the it immediately requested my phone number. Clearly this must be a feature that was not ran be ✨MY PRESIDENT 🧚as the pride of this country would never invade my privacy like this. 🧚

attributes.title: This app is why I have depression
attributes.review: First off it took like three days to download. Very SAD! Once it finally opened it crashed my phone. MAD! All I wanted to do was pay some respects to the big orange Cheeto puff. Definitely wouldn’t recommend this app to any of the chetto followers. BIG SAD

attributes.title: Julz
attributes.review: App took so long to download. i was waiting for about 3 days before it finished which was too late because i needed information about trump 1 day before i downloaded it. It also doesn’t give me a lot of info about our president. WORST APP EVER

attributes.title: This app is a scam
attributes.review:
Let me start off by saying 💀🔫. 
First this app has the audacity to download onto my phone and invade my apps with this curse secondly I never even signed up because I cannot and will not vote for trump. Dump trump! What’s the point of an app if no one uses it?? #AnyoneElseExceptForTrump2020

attributes.title: A shame to the name!
attributes.review:
This app is shameful, my grand baby wanted this so I helped him get it all setup since he loves his updates 🌸But 30 repeat emails later you would not BELIEVE what happened! This OFFICIAL app was just bombarded with some strange thing called “brony p*rn” and I am frankly REVOLTED.
Never downloading again

attributes.title: This took 3 days to load
attributes.review: It’s extremely glitchy like if it was made in 2005 and I’m trying to work it on the first iPod 😐 don’t get me wrong I love being American but it’s not very good to keep something like this it’s not up to our technological standards.

attributes.title: Don’t recommend🙅🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: Once I downloaded I thought it would be a cool way to support our president but honestly this app is trash. It took forever to download, my phone crashed when I opened the app. Do not recommend downloading. Waste of time🤬

attributes.title: WORST APP, NOT WORTH IT
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of supporting our great Amurican president and was instead met with a disgoooostung orange wearing a mop. I have NEVER been so disappointed in my life. Don’t even get me started on it’s “reliable” news source. It was faker than the oranges tan line. If I could rate it lower I would.
